requestParams.name: retail_source
requestParams.desc: 零售调用来源（调用方和有赞约定的值）

requestParams.name: warehouse_codes
requestParams.desc: 仓库编码列表（该参数传值时，分页入参不生效）

requestParams.name: warehouse_ids
requestParams.desc: 仓库id列表（该参数传值时，分页入参不生效）

children.name: type
children.desc: 仓库类型 1：独立仓 2：门店仓

requestDemos.code:
token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['page_no']=1
params['page_size']=10
params['type']=1
params['retail_source']="GUANJIAPO"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.retail.open.warehouse.query', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)

'1', 'page_size' => '10', 'type' => '1', 'retail_source' => 'GUANJIAPO', ]; $my_files = [ ]; echo '
